description.oldValue:
,Microsoft Forms will support multiple question in 1 poll for Polls app in Teams meeting. This feature will help meeting presenters ask multiple questions in 1 poll with single 'Launch', to improve the meeting efficiency and better engage with attendees.
GA date: December CY2022
Preview date: December CY2022
